Looking to trade my Chaos Saiga AK47. This AK comes with the Chaos Titan Rail System, TROMIX Folding Skeleton Stock With Limbsaver Recoil Pad, Spiked Compensator, 7 magazines (five 40 rounders, two 30 rounders,) bipod and a hard carry case.
SAIGA SPECS: (STOCK RIFLE, BEFORE CHAOS)
• Manufacturer: Izhmash (Russia)
• Designer: Mikhail Kalashnikov
• Type: Semi-Automatic Rifle
• Barrel length: 16.3"" Chrome Lined
• Sights: Iron Leaf sights
• Sights Radius: 14""
• Caliber Options: 7.62х39mm
• Length, overall: 35.5""

• Width, overall: 2.8""

• Maximum Range: 1,350 m (1,480 yds)
If you've been watching the news, you know that these firearms are now banned from importation to the USA.
This bad boy is a very finely put together firearm. No issues whatsoever. Bolt can be locked back with the safety lever which is a big plus in my book.
If you have any other questions please feel free."

20,http://www.armslist.com/posts/3625020,"For Sale:  COLT LIGHTWEIGHT COMMANDER CIRCA 1950, 45 ACP, ORIGINAL BOX, PAPER","OCALA, Ocala, Florida",$ 850,"Listed On: Tuesday, October 21, 2014",Handguns,Colt                                                                                ,45 ACP                                                                                ,Single Action                                                                                ,Pistol,"This is COLT ""LIGHTWEIGHT COMMANDER, semi auto pistol chambered in 45 acp. This is a 2nd year production pistol, manufactured in 1950. Included is the original numbered box and the instruction sheet. This model is a compact version of the 1911-A1 with a lightweight alloy frame. I'd rate the overall condition as 99% with only very minor high edge wear on the frame, as shown. The ""chocolate bar"" grips are excellent and show no shrinkage as was common with these early models. Box is excellent showing minor wear, but has no end label. One original Colt magazine included.. Pistol functions perfectly and the bore is like new."

156,http://www.armslist.com/posts/3625156,For Sale:  AAC H&R Handi-Rifle in 300 BLACKOUT,"West, Madison, Wisconsin",$ 325,"Listed On: Tuesday, October 21, 2014",Rifles,H&R                                                                                ,223/5.56 NATO                                                                                ,Single Shot                                                                                ,Rifle,"Brand new, never out of the box. This light weight (5lb.) rifle is more fun than a guy should be able to have with a gun.  It will take any loads and is not fussy.  Compact hardly describes this small rifle. Following is the AAC factory write-up:

The H&R Handi-Rifle, made to AAC specifications and chambered in 300 AAC BLACKOUT, is a 30 caliber rifle in a very compact and lightweight package with such minimal recoil that anyone can comfortably shoot it. This durable, optics ready break action single shot rifle is ideal for the beginner and great fun for the experienced shooter. The barrel is a low profile lightweight 16.1” barrel threaded 5/8-24TPI with a 5R 1:7"" twist. The rifle accurately sends rounds down range whether feeding it heavy subsonic or high performance hunting ammunition. The phosphate steel action and barrel are complimented by the compact, lightweight super tough glass polymer filled black stock. All models are equipped with the H&R transfer bar system that makes the Handi-Rifle one the safest single shot platforms available today."

These are the bullets that everyone wants for 300 blackout, they are very difficult to get, and I only have 4 boxes available for $40 each, cash only please, no trades.

These are the black tip bullets the are the definitive barrier blind / hunting bullet designed for the .300 AAC Blackout. Its performance in the .300 AAC platform is unmatched by any other bullet on the marketplace today. These are bullets for reloading only and not loaded ammunition. These are new fresh production bullets.

This is a precision match round with a flat base especially designed to be loaded for the .300 AAC Blackout cartridge. These are extremely rare to come by these days and mostly reserved for factory loadings. This is a seasonal run product, once these are gone there is no ETA of when it will become available again.
Manufacturer's Description

Like the Barnes TAC-X bullet, the Barnes TAC-TX bullets offers controlled double-diameter expansion, maximum penetration and full functionality at long ranges. The only difference between the X and the TX is the polymer tip that increases the Ballistic Coefficient for better long-range ballistics. Composed entirely of copper, these bullets have high weight retention and exhibit excellent performance when shot through barriers. Designed specifically for Military and Law Enforcement customers, these bullets function flawlessly in AR-type rifles.
Technical Information
Caliber: 300 AAC Blackout/ 300 Whisper

I am the second owner of this rifle. The first guy took care of it (trust me, I did a full disassembly and pre purchase inspection) and had a very low round count (less than 200). I maticulously cleaned the rifle after both times I shot it. I fully expect you to strip the rifle and look over each peice, you'll be happy you did, it looks bran new!
This gun is a perfect trainer, plinker, test bed for your AR, and could be good for varmit management.
I am up in Portland at least once a week and would be happy to meet up there, or  down here in Salem. I also have property at my place so you are welcome to shoot it before you buy it if you'd like!

AJ

852,http://www.armslist.com/posts/3625852,"For Sale:  WALTHER CCP 9MM 3.54"" STS 8RD #WA508-03-01 STS","scottsdale, Phoenix, Arizona",$ 425,"Listed On: Wednesday, November 18, 2015",Handguns,Walther                                                                                ,9mm Luger (9x19)                                                                                ,Striker Fire                                                                                ,Pistol,"Up for sale is brand new in case never fired WALTHER CCP 9MM 3.54"" STS 8RD #WA508-03-01 STSCall or text Joe @ (602) 3 six one 7 2 seven 3 or email REDACTED The all new CCP (Concealed Carry Pistol) in 9mm Luger has an ideal combination of style, ergonomics, size, shape, accuracy, and ability to conceal comfortably. The new Walther SOFTCOIL ™ gas-delayed blowback technology works to make the CCP an excellent concealed carry firearm.How Walther SOFTCOIL ™ Technology Makes This Pistol A Must-HaveThe CCP’s SOFTCOIL™ gas-delayed blowback system uses gas pressure from the ignited cartridge by directing it through a small port in the barrel in front of the chamber to slow down and delay the rearward motion of the slide. This is accomplished by means of a piston contained inside of a cylinder located under the barrel that opposes the rearward motion of the slide until the gas pressure has declined after the bullet has left the barrel. This allows the slide to end its rearward motion, opening the breech, and ejecting the empty cartridge case.Benefits of Walther SOFTCOIL ™ Technology1. It allows the slide to be easily manipulated to chamber a round.2. Barrel rise is reduced up to one third less than similar pistols.3. Decrease barrel rise helps you remain focused to accurately hit your target shot after shot.Size & FeaturesWith an overall length of just 6.41 inches, the Walther CCP is a sleek solution to concealed carry protection. The new model’s barrel length is 3.54 inches and its width is only 1.18 inches making it easily carried in a purse or inside-the-pant holster.The CCP comes in stylish stainless or Cerakote® black and provides all the features that have become a signature of Walther’s line of pistols. It has a smooth 5.5 pound trigger pull, interchangeable front sight with white dot, adjustable rear sight, and reversible magazine release for left- or right-handed operation.This new single-stack semi-automatic has a magazine capacity of 8 rounds. For maximum safety, the CCP comes equipped with a slim manual thumb safety and one internal safety that acts as a firing pin block. As with all Walther firearms, the CCP has an ergonomic grip with a unique non-slip surface.Other key attributes of the firearm include an easy access slide stop, loaded chamber indicator for added safety, and serrations (front, rear and trigger guard) for additional safety and control of its easily manipulated slide."

854,http://www.armslist.com/posts/3625854,"For Sale:  Custom 10.5"" AR Pistol w/ Sig Brace, Mags, Ammo","Little Elm / Frisco, Dallas, Texas",$ 950,"Listed On: Tuesday, October 21, 2014",Handguns,no type,223/5.56 NATO                                                                                ,no type,Pistol,"Partial trades w/ cash welcome.
Brand new, never fired AR Pistol.

A great deal of thought and consideration was put into the design of this pistol, and all of the components selected were chosen specifically with performance and ergonomics in mind. This is NOT your neighbor's uncomfortable and clumsy slapped-together gun-show AR pistol.

I started with a matched Anderson Mfg AM-15 lower and A3 upper set, and paired that with a DPMS lower parts kit. The match grade 10.5"" Rainier Arms .223 Wylde heavy barrel (.223 Rem/5.56 NATO) and GunTec low profile gas block fit perfectly under the 10"" full floating quad rail handguard with integrated forward QD sling point.

Under the hood is a PSA full auto nickel boron bolt carrier group for extended performance and easy cleaning, coupled with an extended tactical latch charging handle. Unlike the constant problems people have with shorter pistol-length gas systems, this has a carbine-length gas system to ensure dependable operation and perfect timing. Fully headspaced with both Go and No-Go gauges.

The extended buffer tube with positive stop keeps the Sig Brace firmly in place, standing it off a bit from the back of the receiver for a very comfortable shouldered position, and won't interfere with a QD sling. That, in combination with the Magpul K2 grip which is canted forward to a more vertical angle makes this AR ""pistol"" as close to a super comfortable SBR as you can legally get without crossing into NFA regulations.

This AR pistol already has all of the upgrades you would have to pay extra for, when buy a ""standard"" off the shelf or cheaply built AR pistol and realize how uncomfortable and inaccurate it is. Does NOT disappoint.
Included:
Anderson Machine AM-15 Lower w/ DPMS LPK
Anderson Machine A3 Upper
Rainier Arms UltraMatch .223 Wylde Barrel - 10.5""
GunTec Low Profile Gas Block
Full Floating 10"" Quad Rail Forearm
PSA Full Auto Nickel Boron Bolt Carrier Group
GunTec Extended Tactical Latch Charging Handle
GunTec Extended Pistol Buffer Tube w/ Enhanced Buffer/Spring
SigTac Sig Brace SB-15, w/ ATF Compliance Letters
Magpul MOE K2 Pistol Grip - More comfortable angle for short LOP weapons
Magpul MOE Trigger Guard
Magpul ASAP-QD Quick Detach End Plate
Also included...
(3) Magpul 30rd PMags
(1) Magpul 20rd PMag
(60) Rounds 5.56 Ammo
NOT Included:
- Muzzle brake/flash hider - I bought a Ferfrans CRD for this build but never mounted it, and I'm keeping it for the next build.
- Optics/Sights - I put an Eotech on this without any BUIS, and I'm keeping that too.
Call/Txt John @ 21FOUR-SIX83-72ZERO3
Frisco / Little Elm"

The one thing i will attest to though was the amazing accuracy of this weapon. I can remember my father shooting 1/4"" groups @ 100 yards at his gun club in Toledo, Ohio.and he was 70 years old at the time. Club is long gone now.

Jim"
